nodes.text: The Bheriz sector was a sector located in the Outer Rim of the galaxy. It contained the Eadu system, which was home to the mountainous planet Eadu and the Eadu Energy Conversion Laboratory, where Galen Walton Erso directed a team of scientists studying the energy potential of Kyber crystal for the Tarkin Initiative. During the reign of the Galactic Empire the Cloud-Riders, a swoop gang led by Enfys Nest, originated in the Bheriz sector.
